sentence: First off the reception staff is not welcoming at all
The hallways to the rooms are a little dim

Not so nice welcome as it is the same entrance as a nightclub meaning our arrival was shoulder to shoulder with drunken people in an environment that required shouting in order to be heard by the receptionist
Also had to ask for coffee and tea making facilities to be specially brought to the room just to be given cheap awful instant coffee powder sachets
Tea and coffee facilities had to be requested and were not replenished
Done with the W Upon arrival the reception did not want to accept me because my husband booked my room and paid
The floor we were on had a load of glitter balls and dance music is being played when we exited the lift
The lobby bar and night club are under renovation
I could tell from the people lining up every night at the hotel entrance to get in
Between the elevators and reception area are fewer than a handful of chairs
Great customer service from the reception team
Worth a stay for its great location within central London and the amenities nearby

Good location fancy facility and nice spa Shower was leaking water into the room the staff was not that responsive also the housekeeping is not up to standards they removed my used glasses and left it outside the room and never replaced it unles I made a direct request at the reception
Luxurious good size room with great facilities such as bluetoth speakers nice sized tv and mood lighting
The hotel gym was excellent and was very spacious with all the stuff you need to get it done
This hotel also has a nice gym for your pre sightseeing workout
The rooms are OK and clean and I like the bar and lobby
Julia and Ramona in the lobby café were awesome and made me totally at home
Staff are awesome and facilities and decor in the room are great
Beautifully appointed excellent location and the best service across the board from the front door reception housekeeping and restaurant
